hotels.title: Award-Winning Castaway Island Paradise
hotels.description: Experience barefoot luxury at its finest with an escape to one of Fijiâ€™s most renowned properties and an absolute family favourite: Castaway Island, Fiji. Set on a pristine private island surrounded by white-sand beaches and colourful coral reefs in the Mamanuca archipelago, this iconic resort is ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor. Set sail from the mainland and step foot onto 174 acres of rainforest-draped bliss and embrace island life from your gorgeous thatched-roof bure, set moments from the water's edge. Listen to the ocean soundscape echo through the resort and indulge across your choice of four eateries, including the exceptional Asian-inspired Restaurant 1808. Enhanced by the warmth of tropical sunshine and renowned Fijian hospitality, this island oasis invites guests to curate their own escape through myriad resort activities; explore the translucent shores by paddleboard or kayak, align your chakras with a sunrise yoga session, or head into the hinterland on a guided nature walk.
